Name: Final Reverberation I
Description: You hand the “treasure” taken from the kids to I.R.I.S. The system analysis reveals it's connected to a missing professor. You decide to look deeper.
QuestDesc: You hand the “treasure” taken from the kids to I.R.I.S. The system analysis reveals it's connected to a missing professor. You decide to look deeper.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This serial number is in the format used by the Academy. Maybe I.R.I.S. knows something about it...

Options.PlotLineKey: Can you pull up any info on this?

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A little closer, please... Hmm, this is a core component from an obsolete Academy assistant droid.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These models were strictly assigned to a single user. One moment while I search the database.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...The serial number traces back to a Professor Sestan.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now this is interesting... records show all such droids were scheduled for scrapping. Except for one, which was logged as missing.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct. And who would've guessed, the Professor vanished alongside it. The official report states they both disappeared during a research expedition.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to witnesses, Professor Sestan left the campsite with the droid after midnight, without a word, and they were never seen again.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Later, the Academy searched the professor's quarters and discovered what appeared to be a suicide note. The Academy theorized his disappearance was a suicide.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seems he intended that expedition to be his final journey.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm not obligated to answer that. I won't pass judgement on the professor.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Moving on, I can provide you with some available facts.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One advantage of these obsolete droids is that their core components include a black box that logs their geographic coordinates.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Meaning we can find the last known location of the droid and the professor.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes, that's all I can do for you now. The coordinates have been uploaded to your Terminal. Your theory ought to be verified in person.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Feel free to go and satisfy your curiosity.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So the professor's disappearance wasn't so straightforward after all.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: His log mentioned staying with the Roya tribe to survey the Void Storm. That could be a clue...
